name: Web Savvy Marketing
tag_list: internet-marketing, seo, search-engine-marketing, wordpress, website-design, website-development, web-promotion, wordpress-website-design, wordpress-consulting, social-media, social-media-management
overview:
Founded by Rebecca Gill, Web Savvy Marketing is a boutique Internet marketing company based in metro Detroit. Web Savvy Marketing serves small businesses and mid-market clients within Michigan and throughout the continental United States.

The firm provides WordPress website design, organic search engine optimization, and social media management to companies who wish to outsource their internet marketing activities. Additional services such as copy creation, blog set up, email campaign management, and press release creation and distribution are also available.

milestones.description: Web Savvy Marketing launched a new online store offering premium WordPress themes. The theme store debuts with four different Genesis child themes designed to accommodate both business websites and personal blogs.
milestones.source_description: Web Savvy Marketing Launches Online Store for Premium WordPress Themes for Premium
